item.title: Automation of bug report classification
item.description: In every large-scale software development company, software defects are tracked with an isssue tracking sofware in the software development life-cycle (such as Bugzilla, Fossil, Github Issue Tracker etc.). Many of those bugs report comes from automated services or tests automation sofwares. The classification of reports by a developer nearly In a day, hundreads or thousands of bug reports are delivered to those softwares without any data preprocessing. Therefore, it is the responsibility of a developer to assign a bug report to a developer who related with him.

Why I don’t want to large scale apps with Python anymore Because every time without any hesitation python code becomes hard to maintain, it doesn’t enforce you to separate concerns (part of codes different from each other) and since it’s a statically typed language you forgot the what a function takes as a parameter and return which object. No offense, it can be very useful for automating things or rapid prototyping but when time comes to build an application it’s very difficult to maintain.

item.title: About
item.description: A Graduate student at Sabanci University in Turkey who interested in software development. Currently, I’m a graduate student at Sabanci University. I utilize programming more like a tool to solve problems that I encounter and represent solutions as an algorithm to observe the effects of approaches effectively. My research interests are software testing, applied cryptography, and distributed computing. Contact information Email: oguzozsauygin@sabanciuniv.edu Github: ozsaygin Linkedin (Resume): ozsaygin Twitter: oguzozsaygin

item.title: Better Python Workflow
item.description: okay, this post will be about how a proper python workflow must be. The reasaon I am typing this post is that I see that I don’t have a proper python development environment ever as worked with python for 5 years. So decided to bring a standard to this at the end which we’ll be strict guideline for python development.

item.title: Secure product protocol
item.description: In secure product protocol aim is to multiply numbers of two party in a untrusted third party.
